column4: does anyone know what the "%u" is for in "firefox %u" command from the launcher icon?
there should be no need to mess with those files manually, you'll just confuse the package manager and then later it won't do what you expect.  Try what bazhang said as that should work
it should work but it doesn't
really?  What did you do exactly?
i set system preferences preferred applications to firefox-3.5
that's not the last thing bazhang said
well, that's great but i'm tired of right clicking.  it doesn't remember my previous setting
read what ubottu said more closely.  Hint: "Properties"
alright, sorry.  thanks for the help
no need to apologize, glad it worked for you!
this channel is for ubuntu support
the last couple of comments I've seen just seem to be sarcastic quips, take that elsewhere please
sorry, this is just the most frustrating thing to not be able to even boot a rescue cd.  i can't get anywhere now
I understand, just take it easy, focus on providing details (in a single line) about your problem.  That's the best way to get help
